job.title: Linux OS Programmer
job.description: Job Description Look for strong C programming and Unix internal skills (signals, threads, inter process communication, etc.) Available to work PST time zone Long Term Contract Must haves Minimum of 10+ years of software industry experience Technically strong in C/C++ with emphasis on system level programming on Unix Unix signals, multi-threading, synchronization mechanisms, socket programming Unix system calls Software Debugging tools Client - Server application development using TCP/IP protocol Exposure to commercial cloud technologies such as GCP, AWS or Azure etc. We are looking for Unix / Linux programmers who can provide the UNIX Systems Programming on different OS flavors. Must have hands on experience in Unix or Linux systems architecture and be able to write scalable code in thorough communication, and concurrency on multi-threaded systems. Must have comprehensive experience in complicated topics such as signals and concurrency and be able to provide practical examples, exercises, reusable code, and simplified libraries for network communication applications. Applications including: Web, UDP, and Server. UNIX Systems Programming (10 Years Preferred) Threads and thread of execution Library function calls Signals Semaphores POSIX threads Client-server communication Time-sharing and Multi-threading Security and fault tolerance Buffer Overflows Breaking and entering Unix standards Simple Shell Logging Functions Please visit our website at www.itcosolutions.com for detailed information about our company. ITCO Overview Performance. Excellence, Value. Founded in 1997, our success is built on our relationships with our clients and our ability to deliver real value. ITCO Solutions is a technology services organization specializing in Workforce Solutions, Consulting Services, and Software Licensing. At ITCO Solutions, our goal is to create a long-term relationship by providing quality service and delivering real value to our consultants and clients. We are not a staffing firm that will just submit resumes with little value. The ITCO team works directly with the hiring manager to understand requirements so we can deliver a consultant that fits. Workforce Solutions Providing qualified IT talent to fill client resource needs, augment staff, and deliver projects on time. Engage ITCO Workforce Solutions to bolster the capacity of your IT staff and/or extend your capabilities beyond your existing skill sets. Consulting Services Streamline your adoption of technology and ensure optimal investment with ITCO Consultants. Turn-Key project delivery Reduce complexity Infrastructure, Virtualization, Cloud, and Managed services SmartSoft Licensing Solutions has set a new standard of value in helping companies maximize their purchasing power across the software spectrum. Hard-dollar costs savings by as much as 30% for enterprise software licensing Simplify the management and maintenance of software purchases Provide an assessment of your existing licensing
